CustomField.formula: IF(ISPICKVAL(Income_Frequency__c ,"Weekly"), AnnualIncome__c *52, IF(ISPICKVAL(Income_Frequency__c ,"Fortnightly"), AnnualIncome__c *26, IF(ISPICKVAL(Income_Frequency__c ,"Monthly"), AnnualIncome__c *12, IF(ISPICKVAL(Income_Frequency__c ,"Annually"), AnnualIncome__c *1, AnnualIncome__c)))) + IF(ISPICKVAL( Provide_a_Company_Car__c ,"Yes"), 5000, 0)
CustomField.label: Employment base + co car p.a.
